sentences.sContent: Fafhrd and the Gray Mouser. Fritz Leiber. A barbarian and master thief band together and bungle their way through encounters with assassin guilds, deadly sorcerers and scheming gods.
sentences.sContent_eng: Fafhrd and the Gray Mouser. Fritz Leiber. A barbarian and master thief band together and bungle their way through encounters with assassin guilds, deadly sorcerers and scheming gods.
sentences.sCn: 一个野蛮人和老练的小偷搭伴而行，笨手笨脚地历经了暗杀者公会、致命的巫师和诡计多端的神制造的意外。

words.tran: 拙劣地工作（bungle的现在分词）
